objective: Achieve actual documentation consolidation from 81 to <30 markdown files
previous_attempt: 2025-01-29 consolidation claimed 82→13 but only archived files

completed_cycles.description: Merged CYCLE-2-SUMMARY, PHASE-3-GOD-OBJECTS-COMPLETE, PHASE-3.1-SUMMARY, TEST-MERGE-SUMMARY, cycle-4-summary, final-cycle-report into single history document

user_personas.description: Merged 6 individual user journey files into single personas document with all 5 personas preserved

pricing.description: Merged premium-features-guide, pricing-implementation-summary, pricing-two-tier-model into comprehensive pricing guide

implementation_guides.description: Removed ioc-container-implementation-guide, onboarding-guide, provider-health-monitoring, license-verification, operation-lock-contract, dashboard guides (info exists in AGENT_CONTEXT.md)

internal_docs.description: Removed all .state/ markdown progress files (information preserved in git history and REFACTORING.md)

planning_files.description: Removed .planning/ phase summaries (completed work documented in REFACTORING.md)

root_level_docs.description: Removed PLAN.md and TEST-MERGER-PLAN.md (outdated planning documents)

adr_archive.description: Removed docs/adr/archive/ files (information consolidated into main ADRs 001 and 002)

test_results.description: Removed test-results error context markdown files (temporary debugging artifacts)

refactoring_docs.description: Removed redundant refactoring progress summaries (info in REFACTORING.md and DEVELOPMENT-HISTORY.md)

files_preserved_in_git_history.note: All deleted content is preserved in git history and can be recovered if needed
files_preserved_in_git_history.reason: Git history provides sufficient archival. Creating an archive/ directory would add files rather than reduce them.

user_personas.preservation: All 5 personas with full narrative details preserved

pricing.preservation: All pricing tiers, features, implementation details, and setup instructions

development_history.preservation: All major milestones, metrics, and key achievements

files_actually_consolidated.details: Merged into 3 new consolidated documents (PRICING.md, USER-PERSONAS.md, DEVELOPMENT-HISTORY.md)

no_archive_created.reason: Creating an archive/ directory would add files rather than reduce count. Git history provides sufficient archival.
no_archive_created.note: All deleted content is recoverable via git history.

recommendations.maintenance: Keep documentation structure lean. Target: 25-30 markdown files maximum.
recommendations.new_docs: Before creating new documentation files, check if content fits into existing structure.
recommendations.review: Quarterly review to remove outdated or redundant content.
recommendations.adrs: Keep ADRs focused. When superseded, merge into main ADRs and archive the old ones.
